disclaimer.museumtxt: Depot Rato serves as Mechelen’s official cultural heritage and archive center, housed within two beautifully restored warehouses of the former Société Rateau in Muizen. It preserves thousands of cultural artifacts, archaeological finds, artworks, historical documents, and library collections. Committed to safeguarding the city’s legacy, the depot offers conservation services, guided tours, and heritage-focused events.
disclaimer.museumlink: Explore the official Depot Rato Museum website

home.dretxt: Depot Rato Events began as a grassroots initiative by a small group of neighbours aiming to unite the community through intimate gatherings. These events allowed residents to connect over food and drinks in a welcoming atmosphere. Today, this vision has blossomed into a vibrant community, organizing larger-scale events that celebrate and strengthen our growing neighbourhood.
home.neightxt: Our community consists of residents from Muizen, Mechelen, living in and around Depot Rato, Durabrik, Lotelingstraat, Leuvensesteenweg, and nearby areas. Everyone living nearby is warmly invited to join us in future events and celebrations, fostering a strong, inclusive neighbourhood spirit.
home.eventtxt: Over the years, we’ve hosted a diverse range of events, both at Depot Rato and offsite. From festive walks in local parks to seasonal gatherings like New Year’s drinks, Easter celebrations, and summer BBQs, Depot Rato Events offers something for all ages. We’re continuously crafting creative new experiences—if you have an idea, we’d love to hear from you or welcome you to join our team.

calendar.allinfo: Discover our full lineup of events. We aim to hold these on consistent dates each year to maximize participation. Stay tuned for exciting new initiatives, and if you have ideas, please share them with us!

media.allinfo: Browse our complete collection of media content. We’re constantly expanding our offerings, so if you have creative suggestions, don’t hesitate to reach out!
media.feedinfo: Catch the latest updates and posts from our social media channels.

contact.infotxt: For questions, feedback, or exciting ideas for future initiatives, please use the contact details below or fill out our contact form. We’re here to assist and look forward to hearing from you.
contact.jointxt: Our community includes residents from Muizen, Mechelen, around Depot Rato, Durabrik, Lotelingstraat, Leuvensesteenweg, and nearby areas. If you live close by and want to be part of our vibrant community, we warmly welcome you to join us at upcoming events and gatherings.

hero.dreline: Make Time for Joy and Connection

events.preregisterinfo: Secure your spot by clicking the button below:
events.nyinfo: Bundle up with your scarf and mittens and join us to welcome the new year alongside your neighbours. Enjoy drinks and snacks in our spacious tent, cozy up by the fire, or dance the evening away.
events.easterinfo: Bring your cheerful spirit and celebrate Easter with your neighbours. Warm up by the fire or dance under our large tent while enjoying refreshments and snacks.
events.haloweeninfo: Come dressed in your best costume and join us for a festive Halloween celebration. Enjoy drinks and snacks in our tent, warm yourself by the fire, and dance the night away.
events.bbqinfo: Join us for a lively summer BBQ event. Relax in our shaded tent with music, savor a variety of cold drinks, and enjoy delicious BBQ fare.
events.pizzainfo: Celebrate summer with us at our pizza party. Enjoy music and refreshments in our shaded tent while indulging in a variety of tasty pizzas.

sponsorship.title: Sponsorship
sponsorship.info: Depot Rato Events is a non-profit organization that welcomes sponsorships from individuals and businesses. Depending on the sponsorship level, we offer advertising opportunities on our social media channels and website, or a selection of exclusive items in appreciation of your support.
